title: Podcast Episode 168 – Spring Break 2022
description:
Hi lovelies!

We are off for the next couple of weeks but we will be back the first week of May with more Read Me Romance goodness.  In the meantime,  check out the books that release this week and be sure to catch up on our current episodes.

♥ ♥ ♥
